About me

I'm Song Kong, a student from BUPT. This is my online home & blog, where I share thoughts about front-end development, my daily life and other insteresting topics. Feel free to contact me by email if you have any question.

Projects

Ice bear: A jekyll theme

This is a clean jekyll theme. To learn how to install and use this theme, please check out the installation guide for more information. It's welcomed to give me a star at github if you like it.

Star Fork

Pocket weather: An applet of WeChat

An applet to provide weather conditions of prefecture-level cities in China. Scan the following two-dimensional code with WeChat to use it.

Selector: A React app

A simple app to help you make a choice. This is App demo. It also supports other types of options, not restricted to food.
